hymn.title: I am crucified with Christ (New Zealand)

layout.singingstanza: I am cru -- ci -- fied with Christ; And it is no long -- er I who live, But it is Christ who lives in me; And the life which I now live In the flesh I live in faith, The faith in the Son of God, Who loved me and gave Him -- self up for me.

lyrics.stanza: I am crucified with Christ; And it is no longer I who live, But it is Christ who lives in me; And the life which I now live In the flesh I live in faith, The faith in the Son of God, Who loved me and gave Himself up for me.
